modules.description: Transforms Markdown documents by replacing code blocks with syntax-highlighted HTML equivalents. Works with the `Cmarkit.Doc.t` abstract syntax tree representation of Markdown. Highlights code blocks in supported languages, producing HTML output with appropriate span elements for styling.

Performs syntax highlighting on source code strings, converting them into HTML representations. It operates on string inputs representing code and language identifiers, producing HTML strings with highlighted syntax. Useful for rendering code snippets in web interfaces or documentation generators.

Replaces code blocks in Markdown documents with syntax-highlighted HTML using the `Cmarkit.Doc.t` AST. Highlights code snippets in supported languages, producing styled HTML with span elements. Useful for generating web-ready documentation with formatted code examples.
